net.varkhan.base.containers.set
Class SyncIndexedSet<Key>

java.lang.Object
  net.varkhan.base.containers.set.SyncIndexedSet<Key>
Type Parameters:
Key - the type of elements in the set
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SyncIndexedSet<Key>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Provide multithread safety over an unsynchronized IndexedSet implementation

This class wraps an unsynchronized IndexedSet implementation in a read/write synchronized layer, provided all read operations on the underlying set are state-less (i.e. do not modify any field data in the set).

Individual read or write access to set items is thread safe, and iterators are fail-fast, meaning they will throw a ConcurrentModificationException whenever is detected a modification on the underlying set that is not the result of the iterator's own methods.

See Also:
Serialized Form
